mapper.insert: insert into education values(edu_seq.nextval, #{mSeq}, #{pSeq}, #{eduDegree}, #{eduMajor}, to_date(#{eduStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_date(#{eduEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{eduCredit}, '', #{eduContent, jdbcType=CLOB})
mapper.select: select t.* from (select e.*, p.pName pName from education e, page p where e.pSeq = p.pSeq) t where t.mSeq=#{mSeq}
